A

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class cool_clock.Control
Handles GUI event responses such as button presses.
addTime(int) - Method in class cool_clock.CoolClockTimer
Takes in a change in the time and converts that into seconds

C

Clock - Class in cool_clock
The main class of the cool_clock, starts the Timer and TimerTask that carry out the rest of execution.
Clock() - Constructor for class cool_clock.Clock
 
Control - Class in cool_clock
A custom JFrame that contains JPanels which display the time information passed into this class and gives input from the user to CoolClockTimer.
Control(CoolClockTimer) - Constructor for class cool_clock.Control
Constructor.
ConvertSeconds() - Method in class cool_clock.CoolClockTimer
Converts seconds into the clock format
cool_clock - package cool_clock
 
CoolClockTimer - Class in cool_clock
A custom TimerTask that keeps track of the time and settings, running every second.
CoolClockTimer() - Constructor for class cool_clock.CoolClockTimer
Constructor which sets variables and creates a new instance of Control for display purposes.

D

Display - Class in cool_clock
A custom JPanel that displays the clock time and settings in a format similar to that of a 7 segment display.
Display() - Constructor for class cool_clock.Display
Constructor.
displayMessage(String) - Method in class cool_clock.Control
Displays a message popup for errors or other messages.

G

getPreferredSize() - Method in class cool_clock.Display
Returns the preferred size of the Display

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class cool_clock.Clock
The main method of the Clock program

P

paintComponent(Graphics) - Method in class cool_clock.Display
Draws the clock display based off of the display information variables.

R

refresh() - Method in class cool_clock.CoolClockTimer
Updates the display according to the current time and display settings
run() - Method in class cool_clock.CoolClockTimer
This function is called every second by a Timer.

S

setDisplay(int[], boolean, String) - Method in class cool_clock.Control
Calls setDisplay in displayPanel
setDisplay(int[], boolean, String) - Method in class cool_clock.Display
Sets m_displayDigits, m_displayColon, and m_displayMsg and refreshes the clock screen.

T

toggleHourFormat() - Method in class cool_clock.CoolClockTimer
Switches the military time flag to it's opposite
togglePause() - Method in class cool_clock.CoolClockTimer
Switches the pause flag to it's opposite
TwelveHourPm() - Method in class cool_clock.CoolClockTimer
Returns the appropriate string to print on the display based on the current time and hour format (military_time)
